---
title: "Model parameters"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```



```{r, echo=F, message=F}
library(RSYC)

RSYC::RSYC_params %>% 
  dplyr::select(-SpeciesCode) %>%
  DT::datatable(
    filter='top', 
      rownames = FALSE,
      options = list(pageLength = 25)
  ) %>%
    DT::formatRound(columns = c("b1"), digits = 2) %>%
    DT::formatRound(columns = c("b3"), digits = 4) %>%
    DT::formatRound(columns = c("b2","b4"), digits = 5) 

```
